verses.name: Proverbs 22:1
verses.text: A good name is rather to be chosen than great riches, and loving favour rather than silver and gold.

verses.name: Proverbs 22:2
verses.text: The rich and poor meet together: the Lord is the maker of them all.

verses.name: Proverbs 22:3
verses.text: A prudent man foreseeth the evil, and hideth himself: but the simple pass on, and are punished.

verses.name: Proverbs 22:4
verses.text: By humility and the fear of the Lord are riches, and honour, and life.

verses.name: Proverbs 22:5
verses.text: Thorns and snares are in the way of the froward: he that doth keep his soul shall be far from them.
